productDescription: This fragrance offers you a woody and elegant accord opening with spicy notes of yuzu and cardamom mixed with coriander and bergamot. The heart is a sacred union of incense and Tudor rose, a true heraldic floral emblem of England.

This floral fragrance combines contemporary fruit ingredients with the perfumer's classic palette of white flowers. The scent opens with sparkling bergamot and mandarin blended with notes of lychee and peach.

Aqua Allegoria Passiflora is a fresh floral-fruity fragrance, focused on the tropical note of passionfruit with the addition of aquatic accords and flowers such as ylang-ylang. The composition contains citrus notes like lemon, grapefruit, mandarin juice and bergamot.

If you want to feel bougee, confident and bold without breaking the bank, then this is the perfume for you. It is a fruity-floral scent with a blend of citrus, Brazilian purple passion fruit, Madagascan vanilla orchid, and Italian pine
